description: The Kari Traa Rose Light High Waist Pant is a lightweight version of our classic, soft, and warm merino baselayer. These leggings sport a feminine, Nordic-inspired look. The flattering high waist enhances the slim silhouette, while the 4-way ensures full range of motion. Thin side panels enhance breathability.
name: Rose Light Baselayer Pants - High Waisted - Womens
